verses.roman:
vadanty anena vaṁśo 'yaṁ
yadoḥ su-bahu-viśrutaḥ
śriyaṁ yaśo mahatvaṁ ca
lapsyate parirakṣitaḥ

synonyms: vadanti—they say; anena—by Him; vaṁśaḥ—the dynasty; ayam—this; yadoḥ—descending from King Yadu; su-bahu—very much; viśrutaḥ—famous; śriyam—riches; yaśaḥ—glory; mahatvam—power; ca—and; lapsyate—it will achieve; parirakṣitaḥ—protected on all sides.
translation: It is said that under His full protection the Yadu dynasty will become extremely famous and attain wealth, glory and power.
